title: Extremely low fps
body: Normally I get around 60 fps on max settings but today the fps has dropped to ~5 constant. The difference I noticed was that in task manager, lol takes up 90% of the cpu. I don't know how much it took up prior to today but it definitely wasn't that much.

replies.body:
Low FPS can be caused by a number of factors, the biggest malfunctioning display drivers and windows power settings. I recommend working through our comprehensive [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), which addresses the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if the guide was able to cause any change in your FPS.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bsoIjpb7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-02T20:49:31.369+0000)
>
> Low FPS can be caused by a number of factors, the biggest malfunctioning display drivers and windows power settings. I recommend working through our comprehensive [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), which addresses the most common solutions for this issue.
> 
> Let me know if the guide was able to cause any change in your FPS.

I didn't do anything and the fps is now normal. Looks like it might've been a server thing(?). Anyway, case closed
Also, I tried playing other games (csgo) and they seem to be fine
Bump, same here. Exactly the same thing happnes to me. 60 FPS at max settings, and still get 5-10 FPS.
